mapper.sql: T.id AS "id", T.customerid AS "customerid", T.housesid AS "housesid", T.housestypeids AS "housestypeids", T.floor AS "floor", T.area AS "area", T.serviceuserid AS "serviceuserid", T.servicetime AS "servicetime", T.createtime AS "createtime", T.createuserid AS "createuserid"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM agency_look_record T
order by T.ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agency_look_record( id, customerid, housesid, housestypeids, floor, area, serviceuserid, servicetime, createtime, createuserid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customerid}, #{housesid}, #{housestypeids}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{serviceuserid}, #{servicetime}, #{createtime}, #{createuserid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE agency_look_record SET customerid = #{customerid}, housesid = #{housesid}, housestypeids = #{housestypeids}, floor = #{floor}, area = #{area}, serviceuserid = #{serviceuserid}, servicetime = #{servicetime}, createtime = #{createtime}, createuserid = #{createuserid} WHERE id = #{id}
